name: hiv_baseline
remarks: The HIV sequence module drives the HIV baseline and follow-up visits.
The baseline visit is technically a submodule in the HIV sequence.
This baseline module is for individuals age >= 13.

remarks: Viral infection should show DECREASES in neutro and lymph, and INCREASES in mono, eosino, and baso.
